name: RESET::RELIVE
description:
RESET::RELIVE is a puzzle game in which time is your only enemy.

A failed experiment inside a secret lab went terribly wrong. Every [150] seconds you will be brought back to the beginning of the map. Will you be able to escape?

::HOW TO PLAY [Keyboard]

::forwards [W]

::backwards [S]

::left [D]

::right [A]

::jump [SPACE]

::sprint [HOLD SHIFT]

::action [MOUSE LEFT KEY]

::ability [E]

::TIME STOP

By pressing [E] you can stop time. With this ability, everything around you instantly stops except for you and what you're carrying at that moment. 

You should definitely try it while releasing an object mid air!

::CREDITS

::Riccardo Pestrin - Team Leader, Game Designer, Developer, Music Engineer
